description.value:
You level the field between yourself and another creature, hampering its movements if it's quicker than you. The target attempts a Will save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1} and takes a –10-foot status penalty to all its Speeds until the end of your next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Spell Effect: Equal Footing (Success)]

Failure The target is clumsy 1 and takes a –15-foot status penalty to all its Speeds for 1 minute. During this time, it can't benefit from bonuses to its Speeds or take other penalties to its Speeds.

Critical Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 2} and takes a –15-foot status penalty to all its Speeds for 1 minute. During this time, it can't benefit from bonuses to its Speeds or take other penalties to its Speeds.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Spell Effect: Equal Footing (Failure or Critical Failure)]

target.value: 1 creature with a land Speed greater than yours
